column3: Use the brown liquid at the designated locations and slay any robber rats that attack.
Well, you don't <Emphasis>look</Emphasis> like a Garlean... Assuming I'm correct, could you help me deal with a little pest problem?
Ever since the Empire outlawed the practice of all religions, I've been unable to pray at Hidden Tear. Instead, I decided to create a spot to the southwest where I could mourn the dead in secret.
The problem is, whenever I leave offerings of food for the deceased, those blasted robber rats gobble them up for themselves. That is why I have created this.
One whiff of it and those pests will be on their way. Though, make sure to be on your guard─some of the more aggressive rats may attack you instead.
One whiff of that liquid and those pests will be on their way. Though, make sure to be on your guard─some of the more aggressive rats may attack you instead.
The rats are all gone? Excellent news. Now I can speak with my son again.
I lost my boy to a quarrying accident some time ago. He pushed me out of the way when a bunch of rocks suddenly fell down on us. He was buried so deep we never even found his body...
I couldn't stand the idea of him being forgotten, so I went ahead and built a grave for him. It's near the area where the accident happened.
Not a day goes by when I don't wish he had saved himself. He still had his whole life ahead of him...
Thank you for all of your help. It brings me some solace to know that I can still talk with my son from time to time.
